title: Nikolai Krestobintsev
text:
Nikolai Petrovich Krestobintsev (; born 22 June 1970) is a former <a href="Russia">Russia</a>n <a href="association%20football">football</a> player.
Krestobintsev played in the <a href="Russian%20Top%20League">Russian Top League</a> with <a href="FC%20Asmaral%20Moscow">FC Asmaral Moscow</a>.
